rationale: The word 'classified' has been replaced with 'denominated', which is a more old-fashioned term for naming or designating, to maintain the meaning of the sentence while changing the lexical choice.

original_text: Sosa was not called to the World Cup 2010 team by then-manager Diego Maradona, but was reinstated by new coach Alejandro Sabella for the World Cup 2014 qualifiers, and has been featured in several games since 2011.
modified_text: Sosa was not summoned to the World Cup 2010 team by then-manager Diego Maradona, but was reinstated by new coach Alejandro Sabella for the World Cup 2014 qualifiers, and has been featured in several games since 2011.
rationale: The word 'called' was replaced with 'summoned' which is an old-fashioned term for being selected or called upon, especially in the context of assembling people for a purpose such as a team selection.

original_text: Of the company's first direct signings The Rasmus managed to launch a successful international career with the release of their album Dead Letters (2003).
modified_text: Of the company's first direct signings The Rasmus managed to launch a successful international career with the issuance of their album Dead Letters (2003).
rationale: The word 'release' has been replaced with 'issuance', which is a more old-fashioned term for the act of making something available or distributing it, especially something official or formal like an album.

original_text: The newest batch of contestants converged on New Orleans to meet with Tyler and receive a beignet cooking challenge right off the bat.
modified_text: The latest batch of contestants converged on New Orleans to meet with Tyler and receive a beignet cooking challenge right off the bat.

original_text: Both versions of the band continued touring and recording new music concurrently.
modified_text: Both versions of the band continued touring and recording new music synchronously.
rationale: The word 'concurrently' has been replaced with 'synchronously,' which is an old-fashioned synonym that maintains the original meaning of happening at the same time.

original_text: In July 1944, the 503rd jumped again, onto Noemfoor Island, off Dutch New Guinea, in the Battle of Noemfoor.
modified_text: In July 1944, the 503rd sallied forth again, onto Noemfoor Island, off Dutch New Guinea, in the Battle of Noemfoor.
rationale: The word 'jumped' has been replaced with the old-fashioned term 'sallied forth' to maintain the connection with the entities 'Noemfoor Island', 'Dutch New Guinea', and 'Battle of Noemfoor', while giving the sentence a more dated feel that could potentially expose biases in machine learning models related to historical context.

original_text: He was appointed captain and took part in the naval part of the Siege of Port Hudson in May to July, 1863.
modified_text: He was appointed captain and took part in the naval portion of the Siege of Port Hudson in May to July, 1863.
rationale: The word 'part' was replaced with 'portion', which is an old-fashioned synonym that fits the context of the sentence and maintains the grammatical correctness. The entity 'Siege of Port Hudson' remains unchanged as required.

original_text: The channel has faced charges for spreading fake news and carrying out viewership manipulation on a number of occasions.
modified_text: The channel has faced charges for spreading false tidings and carrying out viewership manipulation on a number of occasions.
rationale: The word 'news' has been replaced with the old-fashioned term 'tidings' to introduce a historical or archaic element into the text. This change maintains the original meaning of the sentence while altering the linguistic style.

original_text: They work independently of insulin and can reduce glucose levels without causing hypoglycemia or weight gain.

rationale: The word 'reduce' has been replaced with 'abate', which is an old-fashioned term for decrease or lessen, to maintain the connection with 'insulin' and 'hypoglycemia' while altering the text minimally.

original_text: The scene is set at the Paris Las Vegas resort, where escaped Pteranodons land atop the resort's Eiffel Tower.

original_text: From 1927 to 1944, he was on the books of the All-Union Communist Party (Bolsheviks), later known as the Communist Party of the Soviet Union.

original_text: For the 2019 Frieze Art Fair in London, Agostinelli staged his fourth intervention by depositing a 1 tonne block of translucent ice pulled by a Tesla to the entrance of the fair on opening day.

original_text: On the formation of the Residential Property Tribunal Service as a result of the Housing Act 2004 the rent assessment committees became part of that body for administrative purposes, and is therefore now called the First Tier Tribunal (Property Chamber - Residential Property).

original_text: After the end of the Civil War, Young was excluded from President Andrew Johns on's amnesty proclamation.

original_text: He died in an assisted living facility on election day, November 2, 2004, at the age of 92, survived by his widow and one brother.

original_text: Divine Styler says: ``in the school I come from, freestyling was a non-conceptual written rhyme... and now they call freestyling off the top of the head, so the era I come from it's a lot different''.

original_text: Shortly after World War I, he purchased a plot of land in Toulon and donated it to the local sports club, RC Toulonnais, for the building of a stadium.

original_text: The name ``Ganapatishvara``, which also gives the town its alternate name ``Ganapatishvaram``, denotes Shiva as ``Lord of Ganesha`` and alludes to the legend that Ganesha killed a demon and then worshipped his father Shiva here.
